content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":252772,"originalJapaneseLine":"女の子としては、怖い・・おっかない、勇ましすぎ、ちょっといまひとつだな","translatedEnglishLine":"As a girl, she's scary... intimidating, too brave, a bit lacking somehow."},{"lineNumber":252773,"originalJapaneseLine":"いい女だぞ、可愛いんだとランス、お前は彼女のそういう可愛さを知らないだけだ","translatedEnglishLine":"She's a good woman, and cute too, Rance. You just don't know that kind of cuteness she has."},{"lineNumber":252774,"originalJapaneseLine":"いつもきりっとしているが実は・・くく","translatedEnglishLine":"She is always composed, but actually... heh heh."},{"lineNumber":252775,"originalJapaneseLine":"なに、ほんとうなのか、それを見せて欲しい","translatedEnglishLine":"What? Is that true? I want to see that."},{"lineNumber":252776,"originalJapaneseLine":"見せてくれるのなら我がハニー軍団、人類に協力しよう。","translatedEnglishLine":"If she shows it, my Honey troops will cooperate with humanity."},{"lineNumber":252777,"originalJapaneseLine":"さらに数日後・・・ランス城","translatedEnglishLine":"Several days later... Rance Castle."},{"lineNumber":252778,"originalJapaneseLine":"暗い部屋、ハニーキング、他、数名のハニー達がやんややんやと待ち構えている","translatedEnglishLine":"In a dark room, the Honey King and several other Honeys are eagerly waiting."},{"lineNumber":252779,"originalJapaneseLine":"ウルザ・・ほ、本当にしないといけないのですか・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Ulza... d-do we really have to do this...?"},{"lineNumber":252780,"originalJapaneseLine":"ハニー達が人類の敵になるか味方になるかはウルザちゃんしだい","translatedEnglishLine":"Whether the Honeys become enemies or allies of humanity depends on you, Ulza-chan."},{"lineNumber":252781,"originalJapaneseLine":"まったくなんて約束を・・","translatedEnglishLine":"What kind of promise is this..."},{"lineNumber":252782,"originalJapaneseLine":"（ふふふ、ウルザちゃんは素直でないからな、こうでも理由をつけないと俺に抱かれてくれない）","translatedEnglishLine":"(Hehe, Ulza-chan isn't straightforward. Unless I give a reason like this, she won't let me hold her.)"},{"lineNumber":252783,"originalJapaneseLine":"　","translatedEnglishLine":""},{"lineNumber":252784,"originalJapaneseLine":"ハニー達の前でセックス・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Sex in front of the Honeys..."},{"lineNumber":252785,"originalJapaneseLine":"それもこんな服着て、私・・あの頃を思い出したく無いんです。","translatedEnglishLine":"Wearing clothes like this too, I... don't want to remember those days."},{"lineNumber":252786,"originalJapaneseLine":"あの頃と決別する為に服装も変えているんです。","translatedEnglishLine":"I've changed my clothes to sever ties with those days."},{"lineNumber":252787,"originalJapaneseLine":"大丈夫、ウルザちゃんはもう弱い子じゃない、","translatedEnglishLine":"It's alright, Ulza-chan is no longer a weak girl."},{"lineNumber":252788,"originalJapaneseLine":"しかたないですね・・もう　と","translatedEnglishLine":"It can't be helped... well then."},{"lineNumber":252789,"originalJapaneseLine":"それを見てハニー感激、可愛いー可憐、さっきまであんな凛々しかった人がーうわっー","translatedEnglishLine":"Seeing that, the Honeys are moved: 'So cute, lovely!' The person who was so dignified just moments ago—wow!"},{"lineNumber":252790,"originalJapaneseLine":"もう俺駄目・・割れるー","translatedEnglishLine":"I can't anymore... I'm breaking!"},{"lineNumber":252791,"originalJapaneseLine":"（詳しくは　ビジュアル指定を参照　出来上がった絵を元にで）","translatedEnglishLine":"(For details, refer to the visual specification based on the completed artwork.)"},{"lineNumber":252792,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tゼス地域、永久牢","translatedEnglishLine":"Zeth Region, Permanent Prison."},{"lineNumber":252793,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t魔人カミーラが奪われてしまう","translatedEnglishLine":"The demon Kamira is taken away."},{"lineNumber":252794,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tアレックス死亡","translatedEnglishLine":"Alex dies."},{"lineNumber":252795,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tゼス地域、マジノラインが完全陥落","translatedEnglishLine":"Zeth died."},{"lineNumber":252823,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tヘルマン地域での出来事","translatedEnglishLine":"Events in the Herman Region."},{"lineNumber":252824,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t番裏の砦で数ヶ月がんばったトルストイ","translatedEnglishLine":"Tolstoy struggled for several months at the Bannura annihilated."},{"lineNumber":252826,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tラングバウが占領され","translatedEnglishLine":"Langbau is occupied."},{"lineNumber":252827,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tシーラ、ペルエレが捕まる","translatedEnglishLine":"Sheila and Peruere are captured."},{"lineNumber":252828,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tヒューバート、アミトス死亡","translatedEnglishLine":"Hubert and Amitos die."},{"lineNumber":252829,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tその後、シーラが悲惨な目に合う","translatedEnglishLine":"After that, Sheila suffers a tragic fate."},{"lineNumber":252830,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t\"ＣＧ：シーラ悲惨\"","translatedEnglishLine":"\"CG: Sheila's Tragedy\""},{"lineNumber":252831,"originalJapaneseLine":"戦場の説明、初期のヘルマン戦線の説明を再度","translatedEnglishLine":"Explanation of the battlefield: a repeat explanation of the early Herman front."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 女の子としては、怖い・・おっかない、勇ましすぎ、ちょっといまひとつだな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: As a girl, she's scary... intimidating, too brave, a bit lacking somehow.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いい女だぞ、可愛いんだとランス、お前は彼女のそういう可愛さを知らないだけだ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She's a good woman, and cute too, Rance. You just don't know that kind of cuteness she has.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いつもきりっとしているが実は・・くく
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She is always composed, but actually... heh heh.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なに、ほんとうなのか、それを見せて欲しい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What? Is that true? I want to see that.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 見せてくれるのなら我がハニー軍団、人類に協力しよう。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If she shows it, my Honey troops will cooperate with humanity.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: さらに数日後・・・ランス城
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Several days later... Rance Castle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 暗い部屋、ハニーキング、他、数名のハニー達がやんややんやと待ち構えている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In a dark room, the Honey King and several other Honeys are eagerly waiting.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ウルザ・・ほ、本当にしないといけないのですか・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ulza... d-do we really have to do this...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ハニー達が人類の敵になるか味方になるかはウルザちゃんしだい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Whether the Honeys become enemies or allies of humanity depends on you, Ulza-chan.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まったくなんて約束を・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What kind of promise is this...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （ふふふ、ウルザちゃんは素直でないからな、こうでも理由をつけないと俺に抱かれてくれない）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (Hehe, Ulza-chan isn't straightforward. Unless I give a reason like this, she won't let me hold her.)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ハニー達の前でセックス・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sex in front of the Honeys...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それもこんな服着て、私・・あの頃を思い出したく無いんです。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Wearing clothes like this too, I... don't want to remember those days.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あの頃と決別する為に服装も変えているんです。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I've changed my clothes to sever ties with those days.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大丈夫、ウルザちゃんはもう弱い子じゃない、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's alright, Ulza-chan is no longer a weak girl.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しかたないですね・・もう　と
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It can't be helped... well then.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それを見てハニー感激、可愛いー可憐、さっきまであんな凛々しかった人がーうわっー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Seeing that, the Honeys are moved: 'So cute, lovely!' The person who was so dignified just moments ago—wow!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もう俺駄目・・割れるー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I can't anymore... I'm breaking!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （詳しくは　ビジュアル指定を参照　出来上がった絵を元にで）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (For details, refer to the visual specification based on the completed artwork.)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ゼス地域、永久牢
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Zeth Region, Permanent Prison.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人カミーラが奪われてしまう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon Kamira is taken away.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アレックス死亡
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alex dies.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ゼス地域、マジノラインが完全陥落
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Zeth Region, the Maginot Line is completely fallen.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: パパイア、ネルソンが死亡
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Papaya and Nelson die.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ゼスが滅亡します
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Zeth is destroyed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マジック捕まります
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Magic is captured.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: "ＣＧ：マジック悲惨"
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "CG: Magic's Tragedy"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ゼス地域で反撃戦の様子１
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Counterattack situation in Zeth Region 1.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 追い詰められて焦っているツォトン
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Tsoton is cornered and panicking.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 本国に援軍を要請している
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He is requesting reinforcements from the homeland.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ハニー達にも要請しているが断られている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He also requests the Honeys, but is refused.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ゼス地域で反撃戦の様子２
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Counterattack situation in Zeth Region 2.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 作戦の準備は整った、ゼスを取り戻す
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The operation is ready; we'll reclaim Zeth.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ツォトン、人間どもがマジノライン奪還に来たと知る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Tsoton learns humans are coming to retake the Maginot Line.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 分かっていたわ愚か者め
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I knew it, you fool.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ゼス地域で反撃戦の様子３
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Counterattack situation in Zeth Region 3.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マジノラインを奪還に行く部隊は全滅
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The troop sent to retake the Maginot Line is completely wiped out.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ツォトンは調子に乗って攻め込む、首都をもう一度奪え
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Tsoton gets cocky and attacks, aiming to retake the capital again.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ラグナロックアークを占領するが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They occupy Ragnarock Arc, but...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 罠にかけたと千鶴子。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Chizuko set a trap.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ゼス地域で反撃戦の様子４
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Counterattack situation in Zeth Region 4.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ４つの塔を使って、魔軍を閉じ込める
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Using four towers, they imprison the demon army.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あわてるツォトン
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Tsoton is in a panic.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ゼス地域で反撃戦の様子５
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Counterattack situation in Zeth Region 5.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ツォトン撃破
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Tsoton is defeated.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍壊滅
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon army is annihilated.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ゼスは解放された
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Zeth is liberated.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ヘルマン地域での出来事
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Events in the Herman Region.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: コサックの近くの村が魔人バボラに踏みつけられた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A village near the Cossacks was trampled by the demon Babora.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ルーベラン、メリム死亡
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ruberan and Merim died.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ヘルマン地域での出来事
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Events in the Herman Region.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 番裏の砦で数ヶ月がんばったトルストイ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Tolstoy struggled for several months at the Bannura fortress.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ついに魔軍に押し切られ全滅する
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Finally, he was overwhelmed by the demon army and annihilated.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ラングバウが占領され
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Langbau is occupied.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シーラ、ペルエレが捕まる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sheila and Peruere are captured.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ヒューバート、アミトス死亡
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hubert and Amitos die.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その後、シーラが悲惨な目に合う
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: After that, Sheila suffers a tragic fate.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: "ＣＧ：シーラ悲惨"
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "CG: Sheila's Tragedy"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦場の説明、初期のヘルマン戦線の説明を再度
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Explanation of the battlefield: a repeat explanation of the early Herman front.

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 女の子としては、怖い・・おっかない、勇ましすぎ、ちょっといまひとつだな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: As a girl, she's scary... intimidating, too brave, a bit lacking somehow.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いい女だぞ、可愛いんだとランス、お前は彼女のそういう可愛さを知らないだけだ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She's a good woman, and cute too, Rance. You just don't know that kind of cuteness she has.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いつもきりっとしているが実は・・くく
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She is always composed, but actually... heh heh.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なに、ほんとうなのか、それを見せて欲しい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What? Is that true? I want to see that.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 見せてくれるのなら我がハニー軍団、人類に協力しよう。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If she shows it, my Honey troops will cooperate with humanity.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: さらに数日後・・・ランス城
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Several days later... Rance Castle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 暗い部屋、ハニーキング、他、数名のハニー達がやんややんやと待ち構えている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In a dark room, the Honey King and several other Honeys are eagerly waiting.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ウルザ・・ほ、本当にしないといけないのですか・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ulza... d-do we really have to do this...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ハニー達が人類の敵になるか味方になるかはウルザちゃんしだい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Whether the Honeys become enemies or allies of humanity depends on you, Ulza-chan.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まったくなんて約束を・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What kind of promise is this...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （ふふふ、ウルザちゃんは素直でないからな、こうでも理由をつけないと俺に抱かれてくれない）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (Hehe, Ulza-chan isn't straightforward. Unless I give a reason like this, she won't let me hold her.)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ハニー達の前でセックス・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sex in front of the Honeys...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それもこんな服着て、私・・あの頃を思い出したく無いんです。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Wearing clothes like this too, I... don't want to remember those days.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あの頃と決別する為に服装も変えているんです。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I've changed my clothes to sever ties with those days.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大丈夫、ウルザちゃんはもう弱い子じゃない、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's alright, Ulza-chan is no longer a weak girl.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しかたないですね・・もう　と
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It can't be helped... well then.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それを見てハニー感激、可愛いー可憐、さっきまであんな凛々しかった人がーうわっー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Seeing that, the Honeys are moved: 'So cute, lovely!' The person who was so dignified just moments ago—wow!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もう俺駄目・・割れるー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I can't anymore... I'm breaking!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （詳しくは　ビジュアル指定を参照　出来上がった絵を元にで）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (For details, refer to the visual specification based on the completed artwork.)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ゼス地域、永久牢
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Zeth Region, Permanent Prison.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人カミーラが奪われてしまう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon Kamira is taken away.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アレックス死亡
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alex dies.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ゼス地域、マジノラインが完全陥落
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Zeth Region, the Maginot Line is completely fallen.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: パパイア、ネルソンが死亡
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Papaya and Nelson die.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ゼスが滅亡します
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Zeth is destroyed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マジック捕まります
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Magic is captured.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: "ＣＧ：マジック悲惨"
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "CG: Magic's Tragedy"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ゼス地域で反撃戦の様子１
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Counterattack situation in Zeth Region 1.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 追い詰められて焦っているツォトン
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Tsoton is cornered and panicking.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 本国に援軍を要請している
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He is requesting reinforcements from the homeland.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ハニー達にも要請しているが断られている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He also requests the Honeys, but is refused.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ゼス地域で反撃戦の様子２
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Counterattack situation in Zeth Region 2.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 作戦の準備は整った、ゼスを取り戻す
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The operation is ready; we'll reclaim Zeth.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ツォトン、人間どもがマジノライン奪還に来たと知る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Tsoton learns humans are coming to retake the Maginot Line.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 分かっていたわ愚か者め
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I knew it, you fool.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ゼス地域で反撃戦の様子３
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Counterattack situation in Zeth Region 3.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マジノラインを奪還に行く部隊は全滅
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The troop sent to retake the Maginot Line is completely wiped out.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ツォトンは調子に乗って攻め込む、首都をもう一度奪え
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Tsoton gets cocky and attacks, aiming to retake the capital again.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ラグナロックアークを占領するが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They occupy Ragnarock Arc, but...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 罠にかけたと千鶴子。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Chizuko set a trap.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ゼス地域で反撃戦の様子４
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Counterattack situation in Zeth Region 4.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ４つの塔を使って、魔軍を閉じ込める
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Using four towers, they imprison the demon army.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あわてるツォトン
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Tsoton is in a panic.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ゼス地域で反撃戦の様子５
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Counterattack situation in Zeth Region 5.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ツォトン撃破
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Tsoton is defeated.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍壊滅
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon army is annihilated.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ゼスは解放された
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Zeth is liberated.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ヘルマン地域での出来事
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Events in the Herman Region.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: コサックの近くの村が魔人バボラに踏みつけられた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A village near the Cossacks was trampled by the demon Babora.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ルーベラン、メリム死亡
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ruberan and Merim died.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ヘルマン地域での出来事
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Events in the Herman Region.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 番裏の砦で数ヶ月がんばったトルストイ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Tolstoy struggled for several months at the Bannura fortress.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ついに魔軍に押し切られ全滅する
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Finally, he was overwhelmed by the demon army and annihilated.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ラングバウが占領され
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Langbau is occupied.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シーラ、ペルエレが捕まる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sheila and Peruere are captured.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ヒューバート、アミトス死亡
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hubert and Amitos die.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その後、シーラが悲惨な目に合う
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: After that, Sheila suffers a tragic fate.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: "ＣＧ：シーラ悲惨"
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "CG: Sheila's Tragedy"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦場の説明、初期のヘルマン戦線の説明を再度
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Explanation of the battlefield: a repeat explanation of the early Herman front.
